TextView.android:text: An election is a formal group decision-making process by which a population chooses an individual or multiple individuals to hold public office. This app is a voting app that has three types election Organization, Municipalities, Parliamentary. It makes voting easy for the people to vote this can do in few steps: (Notes: Your ID is the ID on your personal identification. If you are in an Organization, your ID is the ID in the verification card of your Organization. ) Step one: get user and password Click on the menu in the right of the screen picture 1 it will show you three options click on check picture 2  it will show you to enter your ID, birthdate, and click on show picture 3  it will show your username and password picture 4.

Step2: login Login the first page picture 1  put the user name and password that you get form check, picture 2  click on the login picture 2  the second page will open Type of your election picture 3.

Step3: choose your election type
Choose your election type by click the button picture1  it will show the candidate of your city picture 2 check your candidate in the check box and click vote picture3  when you end a message will appear picture4
